border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px; padding-top: {{ padding_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px; padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px; margin-top: {{ margin_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px; margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px; margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem; margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem; border-radius: {{ section_radius | times: 0.6 | round: 0 }}px; overflow: hidden; } .section-{{ section.id }}-settings { margin: 0 auto; padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem; padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem; } .slider-top-{{ section.id }} { display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: space-between; gap: 16px; } .slider-buttons-{{ section.id }} { align-items: center; justify-content: space-between; gap: {{ navigation_gap | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px; } .slider-heading-{{ section.id }} { width: 100%; } .slider-heading-{{ section.id }} * { margin: 0; font-size: {{ heading_size_mobile }}px; color: {{ heading_color }}; line-height: {{ heading_height }}%; text-transform: unset; } .slider-slider-{{ section.id }} { padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem; padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem; margin-top: {{ slider_mt_mobile }}px; } .slider-slide-{{ section.id }} { text-decoration: none; } .slider-image-{{ section.id }} { width: 100%; overflow: hidden; } .slider-image-{{ section.id }} img, .slider-image-{{ section.id }} svg { display: block; width: 100%; height: 100%; object-fit: cover; } .slider-image-{{ section.id }} svg { background-color: #AFAFAF; } .clip-{{ section.id }} { width: 100%; height: 100%; pointer-events: none; position: absolute; top: 0%; bottom: 0%; left: 0%; right: 0%; background-color: transparent !important; } .slider-title-{{ section.id }} { text-align: {{ title_align_mobile }}; margin-top: {{ title_mt | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px; } .slider-title-{{ section.id }} * { margin: 0; font-size: {{ title_size_mobile }}px; color: {{ title_color }}; line-height: {{ title_height }}%; text-transform: unset; } .slider-navigation-{{ section.id }} { display: flex; align-items: center; gap: {{ navigation_gap | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px; margin-top: {{ navigation_mt | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px; justify-content: {{ navigation_align_mobile }}; } .slider-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}, .slider-btn-next-{{ section.id }} { position: static !important; width: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px; flex-shrink: 0; height: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px; border: {{ arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ arrow_border_color }}; border-radius: 50%; background: transparent; background: {{ arrow_bg_color | hex_to_rgba: 0.8 }}; align-items: center; justify-content: center; transition: all 0.3s ease 0s; cursor: pointer; -webkit-appearance: none; padding: 0px; } .slider-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} svg, .slider-btn-next-{{ section.id }} svg, .slider-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} img, .slider-btn-next-{{ section.id }} img { height: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px; flex: 0 0 {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px; } .slider-btn-next-{{ section.id }} svg { transform: rotate(180deg); margin-left: 2px; } .slider-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} svg { margin-left: -2px; } .slider-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} svg path, .slider-btn-next-{{ section.id }} svg path { stroke: {{ arrow_color }}; transition: all 0.3s ease 0s; } .slider-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover , .slider-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover { transition: all 0.3s ease 0s; border: {{ arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ arrow_border_hover_color }}; background: {{ arrow_bg_hover_color }}; } .slider-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover svg path, .slider-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover svg path { stroke: {{ arrow_hover_color }}; transition: all 0.3s ease 0s; } .slider-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled, .slider-btn-next-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled { opacity: 0.3; } .slider-pagination-{{ section.id }} { position: static !important; width: 100%; max-width: fit-content; display: flex; gap: 5px; justify-content: center; align-items: center; } .slider-pagination-{{ section.id }} .swiper-pagination-bullet { flex: 0 0 {{ dots_size_mobile }}px; width: {{ dots_size_mobile }}px; height: {{ dots_size_mobile }}px; background-color: transparent !important; transition: all 0.25s ease 0s; border: 1px solid {{ dots_color }} !important; opacity: 1 !important; } .slider-pagination-{{ section.id }} .swiper-pagination-bullet.swiper-pagination-bullet-active { background-color: {{ dots_color }} !important; transition: all 0.25s ease 0s; } @media(min-width: 1024px) { .section-{{ section.id }} { margin-top: {{ margin_top }}px; margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom }}px; margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem; margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem; border-radius: {{ section_radius }}px; padding-top: {{ padding_top }}px; padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom }}px; } .section-{{ section.id }}-settings { padding: 0 5rem; padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem; padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem; } .slider-heading-{{ section.id }} * { font-size: section.id }} { gap: {{ navigation_gap }}px; } .slider-title-{{ section.id }} { text-align: {{ title_align }}; margin-top: {{ title_mt }}px; } .slider-title-{{ section.id }} * { font-size: {{ title_size }}px; } .slider-navigation-{{ section.id }} { margin-top: {{ navigation_mt }}px; justify-content: {{ navigation_align }}; gap: {{ navigation_gap }}px; } .slider-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
